title: Low-Cost Counseling Directory
description: Find vetted, affordable therapists by region.
details: A national directory of licensed therapists who offer affordable or sliding-scale rates. You can filter by region, specialty, and availability.

title: Crisis & Safety Planning
description: Confidential steps to build a safety plan and get help fast.
details: A step-by-step guide to creating a personalized safety plan for moments of crisis. Includes hotlines, emergency contacts, and grounding exercises.

title: Daily Journal Prompt
description: Simple guided prompts to reflect and reset.
details: A rotating set of gentle journal prompts designed to encourage reflection, self-awareness, and emotional clarity.
